trans-unit.target: 「你让杰拉尔德失望。你使远古遗产蒙羞。你愧对于自己。我已无话可说了。」 ～瓦拉司致卡恩

trans-unit.source:
"Bitter water vicious wave
Shadow-cold shallows root-made maze
Home's angry embrace."

trans-unit.source: "They are 'between' in every way."\n—Lyna, Soltari emissary

trans-unit.source: Wind Drake
trans-unit.target: 风龙兽

trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.source: Orim regarded Gerrard coolly. "You are like the drake," she said, her expression unchanging. "It works hard to maintain its position, but to us it seems to glide along effortlessly. You *must* do the same."
trans-unit.target: 欧琳淡淡的注视著杰拉尔德：「你和龙兽很像。」她表情不变，继续说著。「为了能维持在空中的位置，牠努力的拍著翅膀。但在我们看来，牠只是轻松的在滑翔著。你的所作所为就是这样。」

trans-unit.source: Winged Sliver
trans-unit.target: 飞翼裂片妖

trans-unit.target: 所有裂片妖获得飞行异能。

trans-unit.target: 「这里周围的所有事物，似乎都被隔离了重力。」 ～晴空号的杰拉尔德

trans-unit.source: As Gerrard's form vanished into the maw of trees, Hanna mouthed a silent plea, mourning a crushed dream.
trans-unit.target: 当杰拉尔德的身躯被树群吞噬时，哈娜无声地抗辩，并为了破碎的梦想而悲痛。

trans-unit.source: "You are wrong," Volrath said. "I do not hate the living. They often prove quite useful to me." And then he laughed.
trans-unit.target: 「你错了，」瓦拉司道：「我从不憎恶生命，它们对我很有用的呢。」说完后，他便大笑起来。

trans-unit.target: 「一旦他们锁定你，」史塔克道：「这世界就变成像玻璃一样透明，你无法藏匿其中。」

trans-unit.target: o2oBoB：将腐肉人偶和目标生物移出游戏。该生物操控者可以支付o2，以反击此异能。你只能于腐肉人偶在你坟墓场中时使用此异能。

trans-unit.target: ocT：说出一个生物牌的名称。将你牌库顶上的四张牌交由所有玩家检视。若在这些牌中有任何牌就是被说出的牌，则将它们放置在你的手上。将其余的牌放置在你的坟墓场中。

trans-unit.resname: TMP·276 | Altar of Dementia | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Altar of Dementia
trans-unit.target: 痴呆祭坛

trans-unit.resname: TMP·276 | Altar of Dementia | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Sacrifice a creature: Target player puts a number of cards equal to that creature's power from the top of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个生物：目标玩家从他的牌库顶上，取相等于此生物力量之数量的牌，并放置入他的坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: TMP·276 | Altar of Dementia | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "It is not that you will go mad. It is that you will beg for madness."\n—Volrath
trans-unit.target: 「这不是说你将要疯狂，而是你会盼望发狂。」 ～瓦拉司

trans-unit.source: Booby Trap
trans-unit.target: 诡雷

trans-unit.resname: TMP·277 | Booby Trap | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When Booby Trap comes into play, name a card other than a basic land.
trans-unit.target: 当诡雷进场时，说出一张基本地之外的牌名称。

trans-unit.resname: TMP·277 | Booby Trap | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever target opponent draws any cards, he or she reveals those cards to all players. If any of those cards is the named card, Sacrifice Booby Trap and it deals 10 damage to that player.
trans-unit.target: 每当目标对手抽牌时，他须将这些牌交由所有玩家检视。若这些牌中的任何牌与你所说出的牌名称相同，则牺牲诡雷，并且它对该玩家造成10点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Bottle Gnomes

trans-unit.target: 牺牲瓶子侏儒：获得3点生命。

trans-unit.source: "I am reminded of the fable of the silver egg. Its owner cracks it open to see what jewels it holds, only to discover a simple yellow yolk."\n—Karn, silver golem
trans-unit.target: 「这令我想起银蛋的寓言。拥有者敲破了它，想看看里面有甚么金银财宝，却只看到一个普通的蛋黄。」 ～银魔像卡恩

trans-unit.target: o4，ocT：目标对手选择他所操控的目标生物。放置一个衍生生物进场，并将其视为该生物的复制。此衍生生物在本回合不受召唤失调的影响。在回合结束时，将此衍生生物移出游戏。将此异能视为巫术使用。

trans-unit.source: It is like life and destiny: we think we know the story, but we have read only half the tale.
trans-unit.target: 正如命与运：我们自认已知悉了故事全貌，其实却只读了一半。

trans-unit.source: Excavator

trans-unit.source: Flowstone Sculpture

trans-unit.source: The sculptor, weary of his work, created art that would finish itself.
trans-unit.target: 雕像师由于工作过劳，故造出了能自我完成的作品。

trans-unit.source: Fool's Tome

trans-unit.source: Squee: "What's that?" Ertai: "It's a magical book." Squee: "Am I smart enough ta use it?" Ertai: "You could say that."
trans-unit.target: 斯奎：「那是啥﹖」 尔泰：「一本魔法书。」 斯奎：「你看我读得懂吗﹖」 尔泰：「是你就成。」

trans-unit.source: Grindstone

trans-unit.source: "Memory is a burden that wears at the soul as weather wears at stone."\n—Crovax

trans-unit.source: "Here."

trans-unit.source: "Hard to imagine," mused Hanna, stroking the petal, "such a lovely flower inspiring such greed."
trans-unit.target: 「真难以想像，」汉娜轻抚著花瓣，感慨地说道，「如此美丽的花儿竟引发了这般的贪婪。」

trans-unit.source: Magnetic Web

trans-unit.source: If any creature with any magnet counters on it attacks, all creatures with magnet counters on them that the attacking player controls attack if able. If any creature with any magnet counters on it attacks, all creatures with magnet counters on them that the defending player controls block that creature if able. o1, oc T: Put a magnet counter on target creature.
trans-unit.target: 当任何置有磁力指示物的生物攻击时，所有由攻击玩家操控，且置有磁力指示物的生物均需攻击。 当任何置有磁力指示物的生物攻击时，所有由防御玩家操控，且置有磁力指示物的生物均需阻挡该生物。 o1，ocT：放置一个磁力指示物于目标生物上。

trans-unit.source: Hanna regarded Squee sternly. "Because it's *not* a toy, no matter how much it may look like one," she said, taking the manakin from him.
trans-unit.target: 汉娜很认真地看著斯奎。「因为它本来就不是玩具，不管看起来有多像。」她说著，同时一把将魔力人偶从他手上拿走。

trans-unit.source: Metallic Sliver

trans-unit.source: When the clever counterfeit was accepted by the hive, Volrath's influence upon the slivers grew even stronger.
trans-unit.target: 当母巢把这精巧的膺品视为群体之一份子后，瓦拉司对裂片妖的影响力更为强大了。

trans-unit.source: Moggs never volunteer for anything twice.

trans-unit.target: 「每当我将它们组好，它们总会开始互相打斗拉扯，好拿到对方身上的零件。」 ～晴空号领航员汉娜

trans-unit.source: Every page cost a life; every secret cost a thousand more.

trans-unit.source: Squee's Toy
trans-unit.target: 斯奎的玩具

trans-unit.source: oc T: Prevent 1 damage to any creature.
trans-unit.target: ocT：为任何生物防止1点伤害。

trans-unit.source: As the horrors closed in on Gerrard, Squee trembled and clutched his toy for comfort. He didn't know where it came from or why it was so warm, but he was glad he'd kept it near.
trans-unit.target: 当危机步步向杰拉尔德进逼，斯奎不禁全身发颤，只有抓牢自己的玩具，以图减少一点恐惧。他并不知道它是从哪来或它为何那么温暖，但他很高兴带了它在身边。

trans-unit.source: Static Orb

trans-unit.source: Players cannot untap more than two permanents during their untap phases.
trans-unit.target: 玩家在重置阶段中不可重置多于两个永久物。

trans-unit.source: Time passes, time crawls; Time doesn't move at all.
trans-unit.target: 时间流逝，时间迟滞； 时间终于完全停止。

trans-unit.source: Telethopter

trans-unit.target: 横置一个你操控的生物：魔控翼获得飞行异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: After losing several of the devices to midair collisions, Greven forbade moggs from operating telethopters.
trans-unit.target: 因几次空中互撞事件而损失了数机后，格利文禁止由莫葛族来操纵魔控翼。

trans-unit.source: Thumbscrews

trans-unit.source: "We will start small, I think."\n—Volrath

trans-unit.target: 若看门狗未被横置，所有正在攻击你的生物得-1/-0。

trans-unit.source: Its growl is a long, rumbling grind of gears and clockwork, its bark a blast of hissing steam.
trans-unit.target: 其怒鸣是齿轮和发条漫长的摩擦，其吠叫为阵阵呼啸之蒸汽。

trans-unit.target: 在亡魂的国度中，无所谓光荣。 ～维克族墓碑铭
